channel.title: Two for Tunestr Music Playlist
channel.description: Every music reference from Two for Tunestr

item.title: It's A 3- Peat
item.description:
It's a 3-peat on this episode of Two For Tunestr, featuring these value-4-value musician's from around the globe:

  • Ben Jonesy Jones: A new release and two favorites from his catalogue
  • Gilligan: Newly released tracks from band member Christian Leuenberg
  • Longy: An homage to Sam Cooke and two newly released tracks with the Gospel Trash
  • Jimmie Bratcher: Spreading the Gospel & Blues and taking this episode out with 3 tracks

Support sound artists from around the globe with sound money; boost, zap & share.

item.title: Blasting Borders
item.description:
We're blasting borders on this episode with tracks from these artists:

  • Lenze & De Baum
  • Christian Leuenberg
  • Joe Martin
  • Nathan Abbott
  • Temples
  • Vicious Clay
  • Monkey Robot War
  • Deez Laughs
  • Sakrecoer

You can support sound artists with sound money on this value for value music podcast. Boost, zap, share and support.

Sidenote: I will decide when a scheduled episode will come out on a specific day(maybe), for now, enjoy the music :)

item.title: Swivel Heads
item.description:
EP. 41 "Swivel Heads"

  • Intro Song: "Take A Break" by Fentlay
  • Mid-show track: "Waste Chop" by Crow Joe
  • Outro track: "Blue Jeans" by Sam Means
  • Chessboard Pawns
  • The Epstein propaganda machine
  • Bitcoin "Boot-lickers & hypocrites"
  • El Salvador's criminal system
  • Consequences of actions
  • Nothing is new
  • We also talk about music...shocker!

item.title: Cowbells & Boots and Other Things
item.description:
Ep. 38 Cowbells & Boots and Other Things

On this episode, Bubba & Silvie discuss:

  • Sports
  • Life, death & regrets
  • Bitcoin Drama

On the second half of this episode, Bubba picks some tracks by these value-4-value artist's:

  • Jessica Lynne Witty
  • Sara Jade
  • Luca Maddy
  • Joe Martin

Intro & Outro by: Sir TJ The Wrathful from Wrath Of Banjo

Mid-show track: Good Enough by Nathan Abbott

item.title: Tune Out The Noise
item.description:
Ep. 32 "Tune Out The Noise"

  • The Velvicks
